channel.title: Need help with the Drops
channel.description: Ok ive never really understand the Drop Type in the MonsterDrops thing....like idk if the higher the number the more rare it is?? or lower it is the more rare it is??

item.title: Need help with the Drops
item.dc:creator: @BloodyVengeance BloodyVengeance
item.description:
@BloodyVengeance wrote:

ok another thing…how do i change all my NPC drops…cause some of my NPC’s still drop what they drop and i took it out from npcdrops.cfg

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with the Drops
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

[quote=“BloodyVengeance, post:5, topic:282085”][quote author=Newty link=topic=372732.msg2812800#msg2812800 date=1244088857]
The first is the NPC ID that will be fropping the item.

The second is the chance that the item will be dropped.

The rest is obvious
[/quote]

ok can u tell me the rates of the numbers like how high i can put it?? or if 5 is enough? or something so i know what i can put for some items??[/quote]

I think it goes from 1-100, I think 100 means 100 % chance it will drop.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with the Drops
item.dc:creator: @BloodyVengeance BloodyVengeance
item.description:
@BloodyVengeance wrote:

Newty:

In the npcdrop.cfg file or…? Explain the question better please

Yes NPCDROP.cfg
Example
//--------NPCID---------DropType---------------Item----Amount–
npcdrop = 795 3(Whats this mean??) 6889 1
